page.title: 18The Games We Play.
page.content: In the world the most popular game is football.It is a game of skill.Netball is a game where people have to be good at catching,running,and throwing.You have to have good eyesight.For rounders again you have to be good at running,catching,and throwing.You attempt to get more rounders than the other team. Pressgang is a game for boys, and girls who dare to play it.They have to split into two teams and one team can pick a word which has the same number of letters as the numbers in the team. Each person has a letter and the other team has to run after them to get the letter from them. We also play hopscotch,polo,hop and pirates,kiss and cuddle,torture, television programme games,please Mr. postman,and horses.The boys don't always play the same as girls.
